sen.e: From 1346 to 1370, there was Itokuin of Jion-ji Temple in the current location of Jogon-in Temple, which is Tendai Sect temple built by Ujiyori ROKKAKU of Sasaki clan and Rokkaku clan as Omi-no-kuni shugo(Military Commissioner of Omi-no-kuni).
